channel.title: Perch on ossem: a creative space
channel.description: Recent content in Perch on ossem: a creative space

item.title: Perch
item.description: She breaks upon Her Perch, timeless. We are the golden gods Of a silenced age.

item.title: Perch
item.description: charging. Breathing. am i perhaps, alive. in You? can i be? I want to. but i don't see it. a year seems so long, yet so so far away, a desolate country. but time makes you desolate right?
